about_the_game:
Wild Ones Battle Stadium is an online arcade-style game that combines elements of strategy and action. In this game, players control a variety of anthropomorphic animals, each equipped with an arsenal of sophisticated weapons and unique abilities. The main objective is to eliminate opponents using projectiles and cunning tactics while navigating dynamic, obstacle-filled environments.

The game takes place in a series of vibrant and diverse scenarios, from tropical islands to icy glaciers, each with its own unique characteristics and challenges. Players can move through these environments using jumping and movement skills while attempting to evade enemy attacks and strategically position themselves to counterattack. Wild Ones Battle Stadium is a turn-based 2D game where players control animals in battles, earning points, coins, and experience. Customize with gear and pets, join clans, and compete in modes like Battle Royale. Enjoy intense multiplayer action, daily rewards, and a social system with friends.
detailed_description:
Wild Ones Battle Stadium is an online arcade-style game that combines elements of strategy and action. In this game, players control a variety of anthropomorphic animals, each equipped with an arsenal of sophisticated weapons and unique abilities. The main objective is to eliminate opponents using projectiles and cunning tactics while navigating dynamic, obstacle-filled environments.

The game takes place in a series of vibrant and diverse scenarios, from tropical islands to icy glaciers, each with its own unique characteristics and challenges. Players can move through these environments using jumping and movement skills while attempting to evade enemy attacks and strategically position themselves to counterattack. Wild Ones Battle Stadium is a turn-based 2D game where players control animals in battles, earning points, coins, and experience. Customize with gear and pets, join clans, and compete in modes like Battle Royale. Enjoy intense multiplayer action, daily rewards, and a social system with friends.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any modern and up-to-date distribution.
  • Processor: 4th generation Intel i3 or AMD equivalent.
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Newer integrated graphics or dedicated low-end cards like NVIDIA GeForce 8000 series or AMD Radeon HD 4000 series.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible or integrated.
  • VR Support: no

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher (32-bit or 64-bit).
  • Processor: An entry-level dual-core processor such as an Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon II.
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card compatible with OpenGL 3.0 or higher (for example, Intel HD Graphics 3000).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible or integrated.
  • VR Support: no

  • Processor: intel i7

  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card compatible with OpenGL 3.0 or higher (for example, Intel HD Graphics 3000).
